command.not_player_uuid: §cThe UUID is not one of a player
command.never_connected: §cThe player never connected to the server
command.not_player: §cThis command can only be used by players
command.inventory.player: §cYou don't have permission to open the inventory of players
command.inventory.entity: §cYou don't have permission to open the inventory of entities
command.enderchest.other: §cYou don't have permission to open the ender chest of other players

interface.reload: §cThere was a reload, please reopen the interface manually
interface.dead: §cThe entity you are spying on is dead.

entity.title: §l%s§r's Inventory
entity.modify: §cYou don't have permission to modify the inventory

enderchest.title: §l%s§r's Ender Chest
enderchest.modify: §cYou don't have permission to modify the ender chest

interface.donkey.no_chest: The animal doesn't carrying a chest
interface.sheep.title: %s's wool color

item.description: If you see this it means that there is no item in this slot
item.warning: §cEven if the texture is not displayed in game, it is still saved and modifies strength, resistance, etc... as if it had

inventory: Allows you to access to the /inventory command

player.view: Allows you to inspect the players inventory
player.modify: Allows you to modify player inventory
player.slot: Allows you to modify the player selected slot
player.drop: Allows you to force the player to drop held item
player.health: Allows you to see the player health
player.health.modify: Allows you to modify the player health
player.health.modify.max: Allows you to modify the player maximum health limit
player.location: Allows you to see the player's location
player.teleport: Allows you to teleport to the player
player.teleport.others: Allows you to teleport the player to you
player.xp: Allows you to see the player experience
player.xp.modify: Allows you to modify the player experience
player.food: Allows you to see the player's food level
player.food.modify: Allows you to modify the player food level

entity.view: Allows you to inspect the entities inventory
entity.modify: Allows you to modify the entities inventory
entity.health: Allows you to see the entity health
entity.health.modify: Allows you to modify the entity health
entity.health.modify.max: Allows you to modify the entity maximum health limit
entity.location: Allows you to see the entity's location
entity.teleport: Allows you to teleport to the entity
entity.teleport.others: Allows you to teleport the entity to you
entity.tamed: Allows you to see if the entity is tamed
entity.information.specific: Allows you to see more information about '%s' entities
entity.information.specific.modify: Allows you to modify the information that can be seen with 'advancedspyinventory.inventory.entity.information.%s'
entity.information: Allows you to see more information about any entity
entity.information.modify: Allows you to modify the information that can be seen with 'advancedspyinventory.inventory.entity.information'

enderchest: Allows you to execute the /enderchest command and inspect his own inventory
enderchest.modify: Allows you to modify your own ender chest
enderchest.others: Allows you to inspect the ender chest of other players
enderchest.others.modify: Allows you to modify the ender chest of other players
